1: <pb/><t>A yet max eltek Israel, is yinatil Jacob bay Egipto, a ton bay jun conob tx'ok is ti',</t>
2: <t>a Judá max occan cajlobalok Jehová, axa yin Israel max yajawbi Cham.</t>
3: <pb/><t>A yet max yilon a' mar yin Cham, max elcan aj a'. Axa a' miman Jordán max meltzoj yintak.</t>
4: <t>Axa witzlak c'al tzalanlak max aj t'uklabok axca no chiwo, c'al axca yune' calnel.</t>
5: <pb/><t>¿Tzet max on a' mar, xan max eli? ¿Tzet max on a' Jordán xan max meltzoji?</t>
6: <t>¿Tzet max on witzlak c'al tzalanlak, xan max aj t'uklabok axca no chiwo, axca yune' calnel?</t>
7: <pb/><t>Bilokab aj tx'otx' tx'otx' satak Jehová, Cham Diosal Jacob.</t>
8: <t>Max yieltek Cham jun najab yul ch'en, yulak mimek ch'en max yieltek nuk' aejlak.</t>
